english.segment1: Jesus, I love You,i need u, my Saviour. Jesus, Your love it has healed me opened my heart
english.segment2: Jesus, I thank You for all that You've given. Jesus, I stand here amazed at forgiveness
english.segment3: Every time I close my eyes, Im filled with awe at all you've done. Every time I think on You, Im grateful for Your Love
english.segment4: Oh Lord, here I am, raise my hands. I surrender. Oh Lord, here I am at your Throne, Sweet abandon
